channel.title: [317] GloryX [317] Delta | Old School
channel.description:
Alright guys, I admit this isn't the greatest server out there. [b]This is a Delta server[/b] but it was made before everyone started using PI. I don't code or host anymore so I thought I would release this since it is just sitting on my hard drive.
Some features not in pictures: Combat improvements Instant DDS spec Multi barrage Headicons work again Player drops work again Admins can trade Dupes fixed Full cooking Full Woodcutting Better economy than most Deltas Anti SYI EXP Lock Farming Animated monsters Wilderness warning sign
Video of DDS spec: http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/2235/ddsspec.mp4
Now onto the pictures. [img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/765/capturecd.jpg[/img] [img]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/631/capture2pn.jpg[/img] [img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/2696/capture3ux.jpg[/img] [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/9762/capture4s.jpg[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/7817/capture5j.jpg[/img] [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/134/capture6g.jpg[/img] [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/103/capture7g.jpg[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/3222/capture8p.jpg[/img] [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/4099/capture9y.jpg[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/4995/66772337.jpg[/img] [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/3985/capture10g.jpg[/img]
[size=16pt][b]Server Download:[/b][/size] [url=http://uppit.com/hxgf4ob0sq45/Server.zip]http://uppit.com/hxgf4ob0sq45/Server.zip[/url]
[size=16pt][b]Client Download:[/b][/size] [url=http://uppit.com/5dr9gl6iuo9d/Client.rar]http://uppit.com/5dr9gl6iuo9d/Client.rar[/url]
Credits: Delta Spades Me
Enjoy.

this is good but i would suggest moving on to a 508+ the 562’s r getting better but some just lag , anyway good work keep it up.

item.title: [317] GloryX [317] Delta | Old School
item.dc:creator: @dwarvenknight dwarvenknight
item.description:
@dwarvenknight wrote:

Alright guys, I admit this isn’t the greatest server out there. This is a Delta server but it was made before everyone started using PI. I don’t code or host anymore so I thought I would release this since it is just sitting on my hard drive.

Some features not in pictures:
Combat improvements
Instant DDS spec
Multi barrage
Headicons work again
Player drops work again
Admins can trade
Dupes fixed
Full cooking
Full Woodcutting
Better economy than most Deltas
Anti SYI
EXP Lock
Farming
Animated monsters
Wilderness warning sign

Video of DDS spec: http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/2235/ddsspec.mp4

Now onto the pictures.
